metadata.title: CVE-2021-36096 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: Generated Support Bundles contains private S/MIME and PGP keys ifcontaining folder is not hidden. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS))Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.15 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
